Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my phone get Android 2.2 (FroYo)?  I have purchased "Samsung Galaxy 3" Model number is GT-5801 - an android enabled phone, currently it is having Android 2.1 firmware, i would like to know whether it is upgradable to the upcoming version or not? I am not finding  "System Updates" options anywhere in the phone so please let me know.I dont want to have updated firmware with the JailBreak or such kind of way !!
Title: Samsung Galaxy 3 (GT i5801) - Waiting for FROYO Update

history.Text: I have purchased **"Samsung Galaxy 3" Model number is GT-5801** - an android enabled phone, currently it is having Android 2.1 firmware, **`i would like to know whether it is upgradable to the upcoming version or not?`** I am not finding  "System Updates" options anywhere in the phone so please let me know.I dont want to have updated firmware with the JailBreak or such kind of way !!
